label: 駄都, 田戸
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: だど, だと, だつ
説明文: Dhātu (Sk.). The term originally refers to world" (J. 界 kai), that is, the fundamental compositional element of a universe; hence the realm of ultimate reality is called dharmadhātu (法界 J.hokkai). In Mahāyāna Buddhism--especially esoteric Buddhism--the term can also refer to the relics of the Buddha or some other holy figure.   "
